coreAttributes.name: corset dress
coreAttributes.description: An overbust corset, which is tied up and tightened by a series of strings running up the front. A long skirt is attached to the bottom rim, turning it into a dress.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slip)] into the corset dress, before tightening the strings on the front.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(guide)] [npc2.name] into the corset dress, before tightening the strings on the front.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.name] into the corset dress, before tightening the strings on the front.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the corset dress's strings and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the strings on [npc2.namePos] corset dress and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(untie)] the strings on [npc2.namePos] corset dress and [npc.verb(pull)] it off.
